# CSharpNotifyProtocolNtFillArrayWithColumn

## ColumnMissingHistorySet

<!-- 'Description' and 'Properties' sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- DON'T TOUCH ME - I'M USED BY VALIDATOR DOC AUTO-GENERATION CODE -->

### Details

NotifyProtocol(220/*NT_FILL_ARRAY_WITH_COLUMN*/, ...) with DateTime given on table or cell level requires related column parameter(s) to be set to have the 'Param@historySet' attribute set to 'true'.
